quotes.quote: You have power over your mind, not outside events. Realise this and you will find strength.
quotes.author: Marcus Aurelius

quotes.quote: Difficulties strengthen the mind, as labour does the body.
quotes.author: Seneca

quotes.quote: Waste no more time arguing what a good man should be. Be one.
quotes.author: Marcus Aurelius

quotes.quote: He who is brave is free.
quotes.author: Seneca

quotes.quote: The best revenge is to be unlike him who performed the injustice.
quotes.author: Marcus Aurelius

quotes.quote: True happiness is to enjoy the present, without anxious dependence upon the future.
quotes.author: Seneca

quotes.quote: Accept the things to which fate binds you, and love the people with whom fate brings you together, but do so with all your heart.
quotes.author: Marcus Aurelius

quotes.quote: Luck is what happens when preparation meets opportunity.
quotes.author: Seneca

quotes.quote: The universe is change; our life is what our thoughts make it.
quotes.author: Marcus Aurelius

quotes.quote: If a man knows not to which port he sails, no wind is favorable.
quotes.author: Seneca

quotes.quote: When you arise in the morning, think of what a precious privilege it is to be aliveâ€”to breathe, to think, to enjoy, to love.
quotes.author: Marcus Aurelius
